meanings.sent1: The crapy shoes were all muddy from the rain.
meanings.sent2: The garbage can was crapy after the raccoons got into it.
meanings.sent3: The crapy dog rolled around in the dirt and looked like a little mud monster.
meanings.sent4: The crapy car was so dirty, it blended in with the mud on the road.
meanings.sent5: The crapy floor was so filthy, you could hardly see the original color.

meanings.definition: Of very poor quality or extremely disappointing.
meanings.sent1: The crapy movie had terrible acting and a boring plot.
meanings.sent2: The crapy toy broke after just one day of playing with it.
meanings.sent3: The crapy cake tasted like cardboard and made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The crapy excuse he gave for being late was as thin as a piece of paper.
meanings.sent5: The crapy painting looked like a child had scribbled on the canvas.
